In Zug the best things you can buy is food respectively pastry:

content=this is a very old restaurant. The interior is still the same as decades ago and will take you back in time. The food is tasty and you will get big portion for the price.
directions=Directly next to the youth hostel

content=This is an institution in Zug. Once a restaurant for farmers, this place is extremely popular in the summer, when you can drink a beer outside below the trees. During the "Stierenm채rt it's full of farmers, a real authentic Swiss experience.
directions=Out of town next to a farm, but worth the trip

content=This restaurant has the rustic charm of a farmer's house out in the green. In the summer it's a pleasure to sit in the beer garden below the trees and drink a beer and eat a "Cordon Bleu". You will get great value for your money. The menu covers the whole range of good Swiss food. The restaurant inside is quite small. On weekends it's recommended to reserve your table, especially if you want to eat inside.
directions=Before you enter the old town near the lake
content=is very small, but with old interior. Very charming. Italian food.
content=The restaurant isn't cheap, but with maybe the best view over the Lake of Zug. Has big windows. Fish food.
content=Relatively a lot of space. Comfortable couches and very stylish interior. Very long bar. At some Fridays there are jam sessions which are very cool.
